scripts.backup: docker exec -it -u root database_postgres_1 pg_dump postgres://postgres:postgrespassword@localhost:5432/postgres -Fc -f ./backup/database_backup.pg && docker exec -it -u root database_postgres_1 bash ./src/scripts/table_backup.sh
scripts.build: docker exec -it -u root database_postgres_1 pg_restore --user=postgres --host=localhost --clean  --no-owner --no-acl --dbname=postgres ./backup/database_backup.pg  && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d
